/*! ========================================================= * Argon Dashboard React - v1.2.2 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-react * Copyright 2022 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/argon-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ // reactstrap components import Chart from "chart.js"; import { useState } from "react"; // react plugin used to create charts import { Line } from "react-chartjs-2"; import React, { useRef } from "react"; import { Card, CardHeader, Col, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, Progress, Table, Container, Row, UncontrolledTooltip, CardBody, Button, } from "reactstrap"; import { chartOptions, parseOptions, chartExample3 } from "variables/charts.js"; // core components import Header from "components/Headers/Header.js"; import { Tab } from "bootstrap"; const Assistant = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState("CSD 0"); const [buttonColor1, setButtonColor1] = useState("success"); const [buttonColor2, setButtonColor2] = useState("success"); const [buttonColor3, setButtonColor3] = useState("success"); const [buttonColor4, setButtonColor4] = useState("success"); const [buttonColor5, setButtonColor5] = useState("success"); const [buttonColor6, setButtonColor6] = useState("success"); const [buttonColor7, setButtonColor7] = useState("success"); const [buttonColor8, setButtonColor8] = useState("success"); const [server, setServer] = useState("Select Server"); const setButtonColor = (buttonName) => { switch (buttonName) { case "CSD 1": return buttonColor1; case "CSD 2": return buttonColor2; case "CSD 3": return buttonColor3; case "CSD 4": return buttonColor4; case "CSD 5": return buttonColor5; case "CSD 6": return buttonColor6; case "CSD 7": return buttonColor7; case "CSD 8": return buttonColor8; default: return "success"; } }; const toggleButtonColor = (buttonName) => { switch (buttonName) { case "CSD 1": setButtonColor1(buttonColor1 === "success" ? "danger" : "success"); break; case "CSD 2": setButtonColor2(buttonColor2 === "success" ? "danger" : "success"); break; case "CSD 3": setButtonColor3(buttonColor3 === "success" ? "danger" : "success"); break; case "CSD 4": setButtonColor4(buttonColor4 === "success" ? "danger" : "success"); break; case "CSD 5": setButtonColor5(buttonColor5 === "success" ? "danger" : "success"); break; case "CSD 6": setButtonColor6(buttonColor6 === "success" ? "danger" : "success"); break; case "CSD 7": setButtonColor7(buttonColor7 === "success" ? "danger" : "success"); break; case "CSD 8": setButtonColor8(buttonColor8 === "success" ? "danger" : "success"); break; default: break; } }; const handleButtonClick = (e) => { const { value: buttonName } = e.target; setValue(buttonName); toggleButtonColor(buttonName); }; const handleDropdownClick = (e) => { setServer(e.target.getAttribute("value")); }; if (window.Chart) { parseOptions(Chart, chartOptions()); } return ( <>
{/* Page content */}

CSD Information
{server}   {Array.from({ length: 8 }, (_, i) => i).map((index) => ( e.stopPropagation()} >{`Server 10.0.0.10${index}`} ))}

CPU Arch {" "} arm64
CPU ModelName {" "} Coretex-A53
CPU Num core {" "} 4
Operating System {" "} Ubuntu 18.04.5 LTS
); }; export default Assistant;
